column3: rgya gar skad du / / +sa manta bha dra tsarya pra ni dh'a nartha sam gra ha kri ti a'a ts'arya di ka n'a ga p'a de na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588135#588148#TD4068E.TXT.r_2182;TD4068E.TXT.r_2183;TD4068E.TXT.r_2184# bar bar ni sems dang shes rab gnyis la dpyod pa gdags te / / +nam dpyod pa de bzhin du dpyod pa'i tshul du zhugs pa'i tshe na'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588148#588160#TD4068E.TXT.r_2184;TD4068E.TXT.r_2185;TD4068E.TXT.r_2183;TD4068E.TXT.r_2186# yang na sems 'ba' zhig la dpyod pa gdags te nam dpyod pa de mi dpyod pa'i tshul du zhugs pa'i tshe na'o // /
column6: 0.023#TD4068E.TXT.r#587895#587895#TD4068E.TXT.r_2148;TD4068E.TXT.r_2149# yang na shes rab 'ba' zhig la rtog pa gdags te / / +nam rtog pa de rtog pa'i tshul du zhugs pa'i tshe na'o // /

column3: bod skad du / / +kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i  smon lam gyi don kun bsdus te / /
column4: 0.017#TD4068E.TXT.r#587886#587886#TD4068E.TXT.r_2147;TD4068E.TXT.r_2148# nam rtog pa de mi rtog pa'i tshul du gnas pa'i dus na'o // / +yang na shes rab 'ba' zhig la rtog pa gdags te / /

column3: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa / / +sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588161#588172#TD4068E.TXT.r_2185;TD4068E.TXT.r_2186;TD4068E.TXT.r_2187# yang na shes rab 'ba' zhig la dpyod pa gdags te / / +nam dpyod pa de zhib tu dpyod pa'i tshul du zhugs pa'i tshe na'o // /

column3: kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i smon lam la don rnam pa bcu yod do // / +'di lta ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588171#588185#TD4068E.TXT.r_2187;TD4068E.TXT.r_2188# gang sems zhib pa'o zhes bya ba ni sngar rtog pas bum pa tsam  zhig tu brtags pa'i 'og tu dpyod pa 'di ni bum pa'i nang na legs pa zhig yin / /

column3: de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag bya ba dang  de la  mchod pa dang  nyes pa bshags pa dang  bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang  chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bskul ba dang  de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par gsol ba dang  dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu bsags pa yongs su bsngo ba dang  de'i rab tu dbye ba dang  de'i  mtha' dang  de'i legs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588185#588193#TD4068E.TXT.r_2187;TD4068E.TXT.r_2188# gang sems zhib pa'o zhes bya ba ni sngar rtog pas bum pa tsam  zhig tu brtags pa'i 'og tu dpyod pa 'di ni bum pa'i nang na legs pa zhig yin / / +'di ni ma legs pa zhig yin zhes phrar rtog par byed pas na sems zhib pa zhes bya ste des ni rang bzhin bstan to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588193#588214#TD4068E.TXT.r_2188;TD4068E.TXT.r_2189;TD4068E.TXT.r_2190;TD4068E.TXT.r_2191;TD4068E.TXT.r_2192# 'di ni ma legs pa zhig yin zhes phrar rtog par byed pas na sems zhib pa zhes bya ste des ni rang bzhin bstan to // /

column3: de la phyogs bcu'i zhing dang dus thams cad du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la lus dang ngag dang yid kyis phyag bya ba las brtsams te gsungs pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588206#588219#TD4068E.TXT.r_2191;TD4068E.TXT.r_2192# de la sems can gzhan la phan gdags na thabs 'di dang 'dis phan gdags so zhes gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs la rtog par byed pa ni dpyod pa dge ba'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588240#588243#TD4068E.TXT.r_2194;TD4068E.TXT.r_2195;TD4068E.TXT.r_2196;TD4068E.TXT.r_2193# yang na 'di'i las kyang bde ba dang mi bde bar gnas pa'i rten byed pa ste / / +gzhan la phan gdags pa'i thabs rnam pa sna tshogs la dpyod pa ni / /

column3: ji snyed su dag phyogs bcu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +lus kyis ni zhing gi rdul snyed la  sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588220#588229#TD4068E.TXT.r_2192;TD4068E.TXT.r_2193;TD4068E.TXT.r_2194# gzhan la gnod par bya ba'i thabs sna tshogs la rtog pa ni dpyod pa mi dge ba'o // /

column3: yid kyis ni rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed la sogs pa'o // / +ngag gis ni de dag bsngags pa mi zad rgya mtsho zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 1.788#TD4068E.TXT.r#588243#588253#TD4068E.TXT.r_2195;TD4068E.TXT.r_2196;TD4068E.TXT.r_2197# gzhan la phan gdags pa'i thabs rnam pa sna tshogs la dpyod pa ni / / +bde ba'i rgyur 'gyur bas na bde bar gnas pa'i rten byed pa'o // /

column3: mchod pa ni rnam pa gnyis te / / +bla na yod pa dang  bla na med pa'o // / +bla na yod pa ni / / +tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bstan te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588241#588253#TD4068E.TXT.r_2195;TD4068E.TXT.r_2196;TD4068E.TXT.r_2197# gzhan la phan gdags pa'i thabs rnam pa sna tshogs LA DPYOD PA NI / / +bde ba'i rgyur 'gyur bas na bde bar gnas pa'i rten byed pa'o // /

column3: me tog dam  pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +bla na med pa ni mchod pa gang rnams bla na med ces bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588242#588261#TD4068E.TXT.r_2195;TD4068E.TXT.r_2196;TD4068E.TXT.r_2197;TD4068E.TXT.r_2198# gzhan la phan gdags pa'i thabs rnam pa sna tshogs la dpyod pa ni / / +bde ba'i rgyur 'gyur bas na bde bar gnas pa'i rten byed pa'o // /

column3: rang bzhin dang gzhi dang gnas kyi nyes pa bshags pa las brtsams te gsungs pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588262#588269#TD4068E.TXT.r_2198;TD4068E.TXT.r_2199;TD4068E.TXT.r_2200;TD4068E.TXT.r_2201# rtog pa dang dpyod pa gnyis sems pa dang  shes rab kyi bye brag la gdags par 'dra na khyad par ci yod / /

column3: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ces bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba'i  dbang du byas te gsungs pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588270#588280#TD4068E.TXT.r_2200;TD4068E.TXT.r_2201# de gnyis la khyad par yod de / / +de gnyi ga sems pa dang  shes  rab kyi bye brag la gdags par 'dra na yang rtog pa ni sems rtsing ba'i rang bzhin dpyod pa ni sems zhib pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: phyogs bcu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bskul ba las brtsams te gsungs pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588279#588291#TD4068E.TXT.r_2201;TD4068E.TXT.r_2202;TD4068E.TXT.r_2203# de gnyi ga sems pa dang  shes  rab kyi bye brag la gdags par 'dra na yang rtog pa ni sems rtsing ba'i rang bzhin dpyod pa ni sems zhib pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: gang rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sgron ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +de bzhin gshegs pa    bzhugs par gsol ba ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588292#588301#TD4068E.TXT.r_2203;TD4068E.TXT.r_2204# gong du 'du byed kyi phung po bshad pa'i skabs su 'du byed rnams gang zhe na zhes dris nas / /
column5: 0.013#TD4068E.TXT.r#575722#575726#TD4068E.TXT.r_665;TD4068E.TXT.r_666# gzugs dang tshor ba'i phung po bshad pa'i  skabs pas 'du byed kyi phung po bshad pa'i skabs su chos mang du bstan cing 'chad pas na 'du byed rnams gang zhe na zhes dris so // / +lan du tshor ba dang 'du shes las gzhan pa sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang sems dang mi ldan pa rnams so zhes bya ba smos te / /

column3: mya ngan 'das ston gang ba zhed ces bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu bsags pa yongs su bsngo ba ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588300#588312#TD4068E.TXT.r_2203;TD4068E.TXT.r_2204;TD4068E.TXT.r_2205# gong du 'du byed kyi phung po bshad pa'i skabs su 'du byed rnams gang zhe na zhes dris nas / / +lan du tshor ba dang 'du shes las  gzhan pa sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyi bdag nyid dang  sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams kyi bdag nyid do zhes glengs pa las 'du byed sems las byung ba rnams ni bshad zin to // /
column5: 0.027#TD4066E.TXT.r#2112350#2112350#TD4066E.TXT.r_1444# 'du byed kyi phung po ni tshor ba dang 'du shes las gzhan pa sems las byung ba'i bdag nyid dang  sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du byed kyi bdag nyid do zhes bshad pa de la sems las byung ba rnams bshad zin to // /

column3: phyag 'tshal ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'o // / +kun du bzang po'i smon lam rab tu dbye ba ni rnam pa bcu drug go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588313#588322#TD4068E.TXT.r_2204;TD4068E.TXT.r_2205;TD4068E.TXT.r_2206# lan du tshor ba dang 'du shes las  gzhan pa sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyi bdag nyid dang  sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams kyi bdag nyid do zhes glengs pa las 'du byed sems las byung ba rnams ni bshad zin to // / +da ni sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams bshad dgos te / /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +bsam pa dang  byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa dang  mi chags pa'i sbyor ba dang  sems can la phan gdags pa dang  go cha dang  skal pa mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang  'grogs pa dang  dag pa'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa  mngon du 'gyur ba dang  dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang  mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu rnyed pa dang  'jug pa dang  stobs dang  gnyen po dang  las dang  rjes su slob par bsngo ba dang  bsdu ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588323#588337#TD4068E.TXT.r_2206;TD4068E.TXT.r_2207# de'i phyir sems dang mi ldan  pa'i 'du byed rnams gang zhe na zhes dris so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588337#588354#TD4068E.TXT.r_2207;TD4068E.TXT.r_2208;TD4068E.TXT.r_2209# gnas pa dang  dmigs pa dang  rnam pa dang  dus dang  rdzas mnyam pas sems dang mnyam du skye zhing sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba med pa'i phyir sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed ces bya'o // /

column3: de la bsam pa ni rnam pa gsum ste / / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i  dgongs pa yongs su bskang ba'i bsam pa ni gang gsungs pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588355#588365#TD4068E.TXT.r_2208;TD4068E.TXT.r_2209;TD4068E.TXT.r_2210# nyan thos rnam par smra ba pa rnams ni sems  dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed thams cad re re nas rdzas su yod par 'dod kyang / / +rnam par rig pa tsam du lta ba'i tshul gyis de dag btags pa tsam du yod par zad kyi rdzas su yod pa ma yin par bstan cing / /

column3: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba'i bsam pa ni / / +phyogs bcu ga la'i zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588361#588376#TD4068E.TXT.r_2209;TD4068E.TXT.r_2210;TD4068E.TXT.r_2211# rnam par rig pa tsam du lta ba'i tshul gyis de dag btags pa tsam du yod par zad kyi rdzas su yod pa ma yin par bstan cing / /

column3: sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i bsam pa ni gang  gsungs pa / / +phyogs bcu'i sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588375#588384#TD4068E.TXT.r_2210;TD4068E.TXT.r_2211;TD4068E.TXT.r_2212# de dag btags pa tsam du yod par yang ji la gdags pa bstan pa'i phyir / / +gang dag    gzugs dang sems dang sems las byung ba'i dus su gdags pa ste / /
column5: 0.023#TD4068E.TXT.r#588861#588864#TD4068E.TXT.r_2253;TD4068E.TXT.r_2254# rigs 'dra ba'am / / +gzhan yang gzugs dang  sems dang sems las byung ba'i dus su gdags pa yang sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed yin par bsdu'o // /
column6: 0.025#TD4068E.TXT.r#588823#588823#TD4068E.TXT.r_2249# gzugs dang sems dang sems las byung ba'i dus su gdags pa de nyid dang gzhan du mi gdags pa'i 'du byed sems  dang mi ldan pa de dag gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /

column3: gnyen po dang bcas pas mi mthun pa'i phyogs spang ba bstan pa ni byang chub kyi sems mi nyams pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588385#588392#TD4068E.TXT.r_2212# de dag ni sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed yin no zhes ma smos su zin kyang sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed bshad pa'i skabs yin pas gang gzugs kyi dus la gdags pa dang  sems kyi dus la gdags pa dang   sems las byung ba'i dus la gdags pa de dag ni 'du byed sems dang mi ldan pa'o zhes bya ba'o // /

column3: gang gsungs pa / / +byang chub spyod pa dag ni bdag spyod cing // / +zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588393#588402#TD4068E.TXT.r_2212# de dag ni sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed yin no zhes ma smos su zin kyang sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed bshad pa'i skabs yin pas gang gzugs kyi dus la gdags pa dang  sems kyi dus la gdags pa dang   sems las byung ba'i dus la gdags pa de dag ni 'du byed sems dang mi ldan pa'o zhes bya ba'o // /

column3: gang las ci la ji ltar  mi chags pa'i sbyor ba de bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa / / +las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi las zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588400#588413#TD4068E.TXT.r_2212;TD4068E.TXT.r_2213# de dag ni sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed yin no zhes ma smos su zin kyang sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed bshad pa'i skabs yin pas gang gzugs kyi dus la gdags pa dang  sems kyi dus la gdags pa dang   sems las byung ba'i dus la gdags pa de dag ni 'du byed sems dang mi ldan pa'o zhes bya ba'o // /

column3: tshe 'di dang gzhan du sems can la phan pa'i dbang du byas te gsungs pa / / +ngan stong sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588414#588424#TD4068E.TXT.r_2213;TD4068E.TXT.r_2214;TD4068E.TXT.r_2215;TD4068E.TXT.r_2216# de la 'du byed sems dang mi ldan pa mang du yod pa las kha cig ni gzugs kyi dus la gdags / /

column3: ces bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +sems can gyi spyod pa'i  rjes su 'jug pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bskang ba dang  dam pa'i chos rab tu bstan pas go cha rnam pa gsum ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588425#588437#TD4068E.TXT.r_2215;TD4068E.TXT.r_2216;TD4068E.TXT.r_2217# kha cig ni sems las byung ba'i dus la gdags  te ; / +de bas na de dag btags par yod kyi rdzas su med do zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: gang gsungs pa / / +sems can rnams kyi spyod pa dang mthun par 'jug ces bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588436#588457#TD4068E.TXT.r_2217;TD4068E.TXT.r_2218;TD4068E.TXT.r_2219# yang na 'du byed sems dang mi ldan pa rnams gzugs dang sems dang sems las byung ba'i mthu las skyes pa'am / /

column3: lus dang ngag dang spyod pa dang smon lam gyi skal ba mnyam pa'i     // / +byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa ste / /
gang gsungs pa / / +bdag gi spyod dang mthun par gang spyod pa // / +zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588453#588462#TD4068E.TXT.r_2218;TD4068E.TXT.r_2219# de gsum gyi yan lag tu gtogs pa na gzugs dang  sems dang  sems las byung  pa'i dus la gdags pa zhes bya ste / / +'du byed sems dang mi ldan pa de dag gzugs dang sems dang sems las byung ba'i ngag gis bskyed nas nam bdag gi ngo bo thob par gyur pa'i dus na chos de dag nyid kyi ming du btags te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588584#588585#TD4068E.TXT.r_2229;TD4068E.TXT.r_2227;TD4068E.TXT.r_2228# gzugs dang sems dang sems  las byung ba'i bdag gis bskyed pa'i 'du byed sems dang mi ldan pa de dag gzugs dang sems dang sems las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid yin no zhes kyang mi gdags / /

column3: phan pa'i bsam pa bstan pa dang nan tan gyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang du mdzad nas gang gsungs pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588461#588471#TD4068E.TXT.r_2219# 'du byed sems dang mi ldan pa de dag gzugs dang sems dang sems las byung ba'i ngag gis bskyed nas nam bdag gi ngo bo thob par gyur pa'i dus na chos de dag nyid kyi ming du btags te / /

column3: bdag la  phan par 'dod pa'i grogs po dag / / +ces bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +dus dang 'khor dang mchod pa byed pa la yongs su mi skyo bas de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 'gyur ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588472#588483#TD4068E.TXT.r_2219;TD4068E.TXT.r_2220;TD4068E.TXT.r_2221# 'du byed sems dang mi ldan pa de dag gzugs dang sems dang sems las byung ba'i ngag gis bskyed nas nam bdag gi ngo bo thob par gyur pa'i dus na chos de dag nyid kyi ming du btags te / / +dper na 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yang gzugs dang   sems dang sems las byung ba'i mthus bskyed par brtsams te / /

column3: gang gsungs pa / / +mngon sum rtag tu bdag gis rgyal ba blta // / +zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588484#588492#TD4068E.TXT.r_2220;TD4068E.TXT.r_2221# dper na 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yang gzugs dang   sems dang sems las byung ba'i mthus bskyed par brtsams te / / +nam sems 'gags pa'i tshe mtshan nyid thob bar gyur pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa phan chad 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zhes gdags ba bzhin du 'du byed sems dang mi ldan pa gzhan yang gzugs dang sems dang sems  las byung ba de dag gis thob par bya bar btsal nas / /

column3: 'dzin  pa dang yongs su sbyong ba dang bshad pas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar gsungs pa / / +rgyal ba rnams kyi dam pa'i chos 'dzin cing // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588493#588502#TD4068E.TXT.r_2221# nam sems 'gags pa'i tshe mtshan nyid thob bar gyur pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa phan chad 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zhes gdags ba bzhin du 'du byed sems dang mi ldan pa gzhan yang gzugs dang sems dang sems  las byung ba de dag gis thob par bya bar btsal nas / /

column3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +bsod nams dang ye shes la sogs pa tshogs bsgrubs pas mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu rnyed par gang gsungs pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588501#588522#TD4068E.TXT.r_2221;TD4068E.TXT.r_2222;TD4068E.TXT.r_2223# nam sems 'gags pa'i tshe mtshan nyid thob bar gyur pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa phan chad 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zhes gdags ba bzhin du 'du byed sems dang mi ldan pa gzhan yang gzugs dang sems dang sems  las byung ba de dag gis thob par bya bar btsal nas / /

column3: srid pa thams cad du ni 'khor ba na // / +zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +'jug pa ni rnam pa brgyad de / / +sangs rgyas dang de'i zhing mthong ba la 'jug pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bstan te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588523#588530#TD4068E.TXT.r_2223# 'di ltar gzugs dang sems dang sems las byung ba'i mthus bskyed pa'i 'du byed sems dang mi ldan pa'i rnams nyan thos rnam par smra ba rnams ni gzugs  dang sems dang sems las byung ba la ma gtogs par rdzas su logs shig na yod par rtog ste / /

column3: gang gsungs pa / / +rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed zhing rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /

column6: 0.027#TD4088E.TXT.r#2825645#2825645#TD4088E.TXT.r_330# dge ba'i lus kyi las dang  ngag gi las dang  dge ba'i sems  dang  sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang  dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang  lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang  lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang  sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang  lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed  rnams dang  chos 'di dag ni rgyu las byung ba dang  'bras bu yod pa dang  rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin no snyam du de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas / /

column3: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba la 'jug par gsungs pa ni / / +de dag gi yang gsung dbyangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /

column3: bskal par rab tu 'jug pa ni gang  gsungs pa / / +ma 'ongs bskal pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa'o // /

column3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la 'jug pa ni gang gsungs pa / / +dus gsum gshegs pa mi'i seng ge zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588583#588593#TD4068E.TXT.r_2229;TD4068E.TXT.r_2230# gzugs dang sems dang sems  las byung ba'i bdag gis bskyed pa'i 'du byed sems dang mi ldan pa de dag gzugs dang sems dang sems las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid yin no zhes kyang mi gdags / /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588777#588780#TD4068E.TXT.r_2245# gal te de dag tha dad par gyur na ni 'du byed sems dang mi ldan pa'i rnams gzugs dang sems dang sems las byung ba la brten mi dgos kyi de dag la ma brten par yang 'byung ba'i rigs na gzugs  dang sems dang sems las byung ba la ma brten par 'du byed sems dang mi ldan pa mi 'byung bas na de dag tha dad pa zhes gdags su yang mi rung ngo // /
column6: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#819979#819979#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_8949;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_8950# gang dag 'du byed yin bzhin du  gzugs kyi rang bzhin yang ma yin la / / +sems dang mtshungs par yang mi ldan pa de dag la ldan pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du 'gro bar 'jug pa brgyad pa ni gang gsungs pa / /

column3: gang yang ma byon 'jig rten sgron ma dag / / +ces bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +stobs ni rnam pa bcu ste / /

column3: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis las rdzu 'phrul la sogs    pa'o ; / / +kun du myur ba'i rdzu 'phrul stobs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588610#588621#TD4068E.TXT.r_2231# rten dang brten pa  gcig na yang skyon du gyur ba'am tha dad na 'ang skyon du gyur pas dper na bum pa dang sa gcig par yang mi gdags tha dad par yang mi gdags pa dang  khu tshur dang sor mo gcig bar yang mi gdags tha dad par yang mi gdags pa bzhin no // /

column3: gnyen po ni las dang nyon mongs pa dang bdud kyi stobs mi mthun pa'i phyogs rab tu gzhom pa'i phyir rnam pa gsum du gang gsungs pa / /

column3: las kyi stobs rnams yongs su dag byed cing // / +zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +sangs rgyas kyi  zhing rgya mtsho yongs su sbyang ba la sogs pa las ni rnam pa brgyad de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588633#588646#TD4068E.TXT.r_2232;TD4068E.TXT.r_2233# 'di ltar bum pa dang sa rang bzhin gcig  bar yang gdags su mi rung ste / / +dum pa ni lto zlum po skye sdeng sdeng po la chu 'dzin pa'i bya ba byed pa'i dbyibs can yin la sa'i dbyibs kyang rnam pa gzhan du 'dug bas sa dang gcig pa zhes gdags su yang mi rung ba las bum pa tha dad pa zhes kyang gdags su mi rung ste / /

column3: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis gsungs pa / / +zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing // / +zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588647#588655#TD4068E.TXT.r_2233# dum pa ni lto zlum po skye sdeng sdeng po la chu 'dzin pa'i bya ba byed pa'i dbyibs can yin la sa'i dbyibs kyang rnam pa gzhan du 'dug bas sa dang gcig pa zhes gdags su yang mi rung ba las bum pa tha dad pa zhes kyang gdags su mi rung ste / /

column3: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su slob par yongs su bsngo ba ni rnam pa gnyis te / / +de la  de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su slob par bsngo ba ni / /

column3: rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyi thu thog / / +zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /

column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588817#588827#TD4068E.TXT.r_2248;TD4068E.TXT.r_2249# de nyid dang gzhan du mi gdags so zhes spyi tsam du bstan pa de dag kyang khyad par du na ming gis gang dang gang yin pa mi shes pas khyad par shes par 'dod nas de dag kyang gang zhe na zhes dris te / / +gzugs dang sems dang sems las byung ba'i dus su gdags pa de nyid dang gzhan du mi gdags pa'i 'du byed sems  dang mi ldan pa de dag gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /

column7: 0.023#TD4068E.TXT.r#588377#588378#TD4068E.TXT.r_2211;TD4068E.TXT.r_2212# gang dag    gzugs dang sems dang sems las byung ba'i dus su gdags pa ste / / +de dag ni sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed yin no zhes ma smos su zin kyang sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed bshad pa'i skabs yin pas gang gzugs kyi dus la gdags pa dang  sems kyi dus la gdags pa dang   sems las byung ba'i dus la gdags pa de dag ni 'du byed sems dang mi ldan pa'o zhes bya ba'o // /

column3: byang chub shing dbang drung du de myur zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +mdor na 'jig rten gyi dang 'jig rten  las 'das pa'i sbyor ba thob pa ni legs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588865#588881#TD4068E.TXT.r_2254;TD4068E.TXT.r_2255# gzhan yang gzugs dang  sems dang sems las byung ba'i dus su gdags pa yang sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed yin par bsdu'o // /
column5: 1.788#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2765223#2765225#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_9090# gzugs la sogs pa'i ming can gyi dngos po kho na la phung po la sogs pa nye bar 'dogs pa dang  gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dag la bza' ba dang btung ba dang  bzhon pa dang  gos dang  rgyan dang  khang khyim dang  dmag dang  nags tshal la sogs  pa nye bar 'dogs pa dang  'dus byas kyi ming can gyi dngos po la skye ba dang  rga ba dang  gnas pa dang  mi rtag pa dang  sa bon dang  rnam par rig byed dang  rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang  thob pa dang  'thob pa ma yin pa dang  srog gi dbang po dang  ris mthun pa dang   ming gi tshogs dang  tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs rnams dang so so'i skye bo nyid dang  tshogs pa dang ma tshogs pa dang  'jug pa dang so sor nges pa dang  sbyor ba dang  mgyogs pa dang  go rims dang  dus dang yul dang grangs nye bar 'dogs pa dang  gzugs kyi  'dug pa med pa tsam la gnas te ltos shing brten nas nam mkha' zhes nye bar 'dogs te nam mkha' 'dus ma byas zhes gdags pa dang  de'i mjug thogs su ming gi 'jug pa tsam la gnas te ltos shing brten nas / /
column6: 0.024#TD4035E.TXT.r#132696#132697#TD4035E.TXT.r_1286# ba dang  smra ba dang  mi smra ba dang  gnyid dang  snyom pa bsangs ba rnams dang  zos pa dang  'thungs pa dang  'chos pa dang  myangs pa dang  goms pa dang  ma goms pa dang  bag med pa dang  bag yod pa rnams dang  bsdu ba dang   spro ba dang  'grib pa dang  'phel ba dang  rtog pa dang  dpyod pa dang  nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  spros pa dang  spros pa med pa rnams dang  nyams stobs dang  nyam chung ba dang  bsgrub pa dang  sgrub pa dang  'jug pa dang  so sor nges pa  dang  'byor 'brel dang  mgyogs pa dang  go rims dang  dus dang  yul dang  grangs dang  tshogs pa dang  ma tshogs pa dang  'dra ba dang  mi 'dra ba rnams dang  'dres pa dang  thun mong dang  mngon sum dang  lkog dang  bsgribs pa bsgrags pa  rnams dang  dgos pa dang  rgyu dang  'dul ba dang  'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang  yo byad dang  bden pa dang  brdzun pa dang  phan pa dang  mi phan pa dang  gnas dang  dogs pa dang  ltad mo rnams dang  'jigs pa med pa dang  'jigs pa med pa ma yin pa dang   gsal ba dang  mi gsal ba dang  gsad pa dang  bcing ba dang  go rar bzhug pa dang  gcad pa dang  sbyugs pa rnams dang  gshe ba dang  khro ba dang  brdeg pa dang  bsdigs pa dang  dam 'cha' ba dang  bsreg pa dang  bsrul ba dang  bskam pa dang  btso  ba dang  dril ba dang  rnyog pa can dang  yid ches pa'i lung dang  rjes su dpag pa rnams so // /
column7: 0.024#TD4035E.TXT.r#135589#135590#TD4035E.TXT.r_1874# sdom pa dang  sdom ba ma yin par bsdus pa'i gzugs dang  ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi gzugs dang   thob pa dang  'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang  'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang  'du shes med pa dang  srog gi dbang po dang  ris mthun pa dang  so so'i skye bo nyid dang  skye ba dang  rga ba dang  gnas pa dang  mi rtag pa nyid dang  ming gi tshogs rnams dang   tshig gi tshogs rnams dang  yi ge'i tshogs rnams dang  'jug pa dang  so sor nges pa dang  'byor 'brel dang  mgyogs pa dang  go rims dang  dus dang  yul dang  grangs dang  tshogs pa dang  tshogs pa ma yin pa dang  'dus ma byas kyi dngos po brgyad de / /
column8: 0.024#TD4049E.TXT.r#2289932#2289932#TD4049E.TXT.r_445# 'thob pa dang  'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang  'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang  'du shes med pa pa dang  srog gi dbang po dang  ris mthun pa dang  skye ba dang  rga ba dang  gnas pa dang  mi rtag pa nyid dang  ming  gi tshogs dang  tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs dang  so so'i skye bo nyid dang  'jug pa dang  so sor nges pa dang  'byor 'brel pa dang  mgyogs pa dang  go rims dang  dus dang  yul dang  grangs dang tshogs pa'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588880#588891#TD4068E.TXT.r_2255;TD4068E.TXT.r_2256# de dag kyang gang zhe na 'dir ma smos pa 'jug pa dang  so sor nges pa dang  sbyor ba dang  mgyogs pa dang  go rims dang  dus dang  yul dang   grangs dang  tshogs pa zhes BYA BA LA SOGS PA rnams so // /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag bya ba dang  de la mchod    pa dang  sdig pa bshags pa dang  bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang  chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang  de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par gsol ba dang  dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba dang  de'i rab tu dbye ba dang  de'i mtha' dang  de dag gi legs  pa rnams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588945#588954#TD4068E.TXT.r_2261;TD4068E.TXT.r_2262;TD4068E.TXT.r_2263;TD4068E.TXT.r_2264# mi dge ba'i chos ma rnyed pa rnyed nas skad cig ma gnyis pa phan chad nas chos de dag bdag la yod cing de dag dang ldan pa la ni ldan     // / +pa zhes bya'o // / +de ltar na thob pa dang ldan pa gnyis la rnyed pa zhes bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#588955#588972#TD4068E.TXT.r_2263;TD4068E.TXT.r_2264;TD4068E.TXT.r_2265;TD4068E.TXT.r_2266;TD4068E.TXT.r_2267# de ltar na thob pa dang ldan pa gnyis la rnyed pa zhes bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no // / +rnyed pa de la phye na du yod pa bstan pa'i phyir / /

column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589098#589106#TD4068E.TXT.r_2280;TD4068E.TXT.r_2281# skad cig ma gnyis pa dang gsum pa man chad  nas dbang gi gnas rnyed kyi bar dag la sa bon zhes bya ba ni dbang dang thob par ldan pa rnyed pa gnyis la bya'i // /

column3: rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal ba zhes bya ste / / +sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du / / +sdig pa'i chos rnams las rgyal bas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589127#589138#TD4068E.TXT.r_2282;TD4068E.TXT.r_2283# yang na sa bon rnyed pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i rnams dag pa dang mi  dge ba dang lung du bstan du med pa'i chos kyi sa bon sems kyi rgyud la rnyed pa la bya'o // / +dbang rnyed pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyis nam 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang mngon par shes pa rnams mngon sum du bya ba la dbang yod par gyur pa la ni dbang rnyed pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: nyer 'grong ni rgyal ba yin // / +zhes gsungs pa la sogs pa'o // / +de ltar dus gsum du gshegs pa'i rgyal ba  thams cad la phyag bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589139#589150#TD4068E.TXT.r_2283;TD4068E.TXT.r_2284;TD4068E.TXT.r_2285# dbang rnyed pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyis nam 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang mngon par shes pa rnams mngon sum du bya ba la dbang yod par gyur pa la ni dbang rnyed pa zhes bya'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589158#589172#TD4068E.TXT.r_2285;TD4068E.TXT.r_2286;TD4068E.TXT.r_2287;TD4068E.TXT.r_2288;TD4068E.TXT.r_2289;TD4068E.TXT.r_2290# dbang po lnga las so so'i yul mngon sum du byed pa ni mngon sum du gyur pa rnyed pa zhes bya'o // / +ci rigs par sbyor ro zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar rigs te / /

column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589171#589183#TD4068E.TXT.r_2289;TD4068E.TXT.r_2290;TD4068E.TXT.r_2291;TD4068E.TXT.r_2292# mngon du gyur pa ni ldan pa dang sbyar ro // / +'du shes  med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir / /

column6: 0.019#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1452040#1452040#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_6127;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_6128# de dag dang mi mthun pas de dag la snyoms par 'jug par sbyor ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'du shes dang tshor ba dang mi mthun pas snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la sbyor ba'i phyir ro // / +'du shes dang mi mthun pas ni 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la     // /
column7: 0.021#TD4066E.TXT.r#2112976#2112977#TD4066E.TXT.r_1523# 'du shes dang tshor bas yongs  su skyo nas de med pa'i phyir 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la zhi bar gnas pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.022#TD4051E.TXT.r#1239958#1239958#TD4051E.TXT.r_1048# snyoms par 'jug pa gnyis dang 'du shes pa na med pas ma khyab pa'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.022#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1078580#1078580#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4387# nyon mongs pa thag bsring bar bya ba'i phyir dang  snyoms par 'jug pa la dbang bar bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column10: 0.027#TD4068E.TXT.r#596381#596381#TD4068E.TXT.r_3118# rigs pa'i gtan tshigs gnyis kyis kun gzhi yod par bstan pa'i phyir gang gi phyir 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang  'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang  'du shes med pa pa las langs nas yang yul rnam par rig pa  'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba dang zhes bya ba smos te / /
column11: 0.027#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2614018#2614018#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9677# dbang  po dang snyoms par 'jug pa las so zhes bya ba ni dbang po rno ba'i phyir dang  'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column12: 0.028#TD4097E.TXT.r#2223851#2223851#TD4097E.TXT.r_2833;TD4097E.TXT.r_2834# 'dod chags dang bral bas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'di bsam gtan gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba tsam gyis 'thob pa ma yin te ma goms pa'i phyir ro // / +'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni 'gog pas na 'gog pa'o // /
column13: 0.028#TD4068E.TXT.r#590151#590152#TD4068E.TXT.r_2394# de nas de bas kyang sems shin tu phra ba bskyed nas sems thams cad 'gag pa'i mtshan nyid 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mngon sum du byed pas na gnas pa'i 'du shes sngon du yid la byed pas zhes bya'o // /
column14: 0.029#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1504262#1504262#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_12100;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_12101# nying mtshams sbyor ba'i sems ni gdon mi za bar nyon mongs pa can nyid yin pas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la sogs pa yin pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro // / +nyon mongs pa med par mi skye ba'i phyir te / /

column3: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +der smon pa'i smon lam yin pas na smon lam zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589184#589193#TD4068E.TXT.r_2291;TD4068E.TXT.r_2292;TD4068E.TXT.r_2293# 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang zhe na zhes dris te / / +'du shes med pa'i mtshan nyid du snyoms par 'jug pa'am 'du shes med pa ni 'du shes med pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yin te / /

column3: de'i stobs kyis nyon mongs pa la sogs pas zil gyis mi non cing mi mthun pa'i phyogs bcom pas na stobs dag gis zhes bya ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589194#589204#TD4068E.TXT.r_2292;TD4068E.TXT.r_2293;TD4068E.TXT.r_2294# 'du shes med pa'i mtshan nyid du snyoms par 'jug pa'am 'du shes med pa ni 'du shes med pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yin te / / +rnam  par smin pa 'du shes med pa de thob par bya ba'i phyir snyoms par 'jug pa la 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: rnam pa gzhan las ni 'di lta bu'i byed pa mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro // / +da ni yid kyis phyag bya ba ste / /

column7: 0.012#TD4068E.TXT.r#577759#577759#TD4068E.TXT.r_919# shes rab kyi rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /

column9: 0.012#TD4068E.TXT.r#582275#582275#TD4068E.TXT.r_1487# ma rig pa'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /

column31: 0.012#TD4068E.TXT.r#593206#593206#TD4068E.TXT.r_2740# so so skye bo'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /
column32: 0.012#TD4068E.TXT.r#593812#593812#TD4068E.TXT.r_2819# rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /

column3: rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed ces bya ba la sogs  pa'o ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589214#589222#TD4068E.TXT.r_2295;TD4068E.TXT.r_2296# de'i lan du dge rgyas kyi 'dod chags dang bral la gong ma'i ma yin pa ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PA smos so // /

column3: rdul gcig gi steng du rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnam pa zhes bya ba ni khyad par du ma smos pa'i phyir phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing gi rdul snyed kyis bde bar gshegs pa rnams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589221#589241#TD4068E.TXT.r_2296;TD4068E.TXT.r_2297# de la 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnas ni nyi shu ste 'dzam bu gling 'di'i 'og na tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba brgyad dang  gling bzhi dang  'dod pa'i khams kyi lha drug dang  byol song dang  yi dags so // /

column3: sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa dag / / +ces bya  ba ni re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa'i tshogs kyi dbus na bzhugs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589242#589254#TD4068E.TXT.r_2297# de la tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba brgyad ni mnar med pa dang  rab tu gdung ba dang   gdung ba dang  'o dod cher 'bod pa dang  'o dod 'bod pa dang  'dus 'joms dang  thig nag dang  yang sos so // /

column3: rdul gcig gi steng du ji ltar bsams pa de bzhin du thams cad du bsam par bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589253#589264#TD4068E.TXT.r_2297;TD4068E.TXT.r_2298;TD4068E.TXT.r_2299# de la tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba brgyad ni mnar med pa dang  rab tu gdung ba dang   gdung ba dang  'o dod cher 'bod pa dang  'o dod 'bod pa dang  'dus 'joms dang  thig nag dang  yang sos so // /
column5: 0.019#TD4091E.TXT.r#707699#707699#TD4091E.TXT.r_2447# gling bzhi ste 'dzam bu'i gling dang  shar gyi lus 'phags dang  nub gyi kyi ba lang spyod dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan dang  bshad ma thag pa'i lha'i ris drug ste / /
column6: 0.024#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1623325#1623325#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4783;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4784# yang sos dang  thig nag dang  bsdus 'joms dang  ngu 'bod dang  ngu 'bod chen po dang  tsha ba dang  rab tu tsha ba dang  mnar med pa dang  gling bzhi ste / / +'dzam bu'i gling dang  shar gyi lus 'phags gling dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod dang  byang gi  sgra mi snyan dang  bshad ma thag pa'i lha'i ris drug dang  yi dvags rnams dang  dud 'gro ste / /
column7: 0.025#TD4054E.TXT.r#1011379#1011380#TD4054E.TXT.r_3445# sems can dmyal ba rnams su dang  sems can dud 'gro rnams dang  yi dags rnams dang  mi dang  shar gyi lus 'phags dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod dang  lho'i 'dzam bu gling dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha     // /
column8: 0.027#TD4098E.TXT.r#1393490#1393490#TD4098E.TXT.r_562;TD4098E.TXT.r_563# dud 'gro dang  yi dags dang  gling bzhi ste / / +'dzam bu gling dang  shar gyi lus 'phags dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan no // /

column3: de ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams ma lus pa // / +zhes bya ba bshad de / / +chos kyi dbyings  ni thams cad du khyab par byed pa'i phyir nam mkha'i mthas klas pa thams cad yang rdul gcig gi steng na rdul snying kyi sangs rgyas re re la yang byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa'i tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba rnams kyis gang zhing bar mtshams med par khyab par yid kyis mos    par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589263#589272#TD4068E.TXT.r_2298;TD4068E.TXT.r_2299# gling bzhi ni lho'i 'dzam bu'i gling dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan dang  shar gyi lus 'phags so // / +'dod pa'i khams kyi lha drug ni  rgyal chen ris bzhi'i rigs dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral thun spyoms dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589273#589281#TD4068E.TXT.r_2299# 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha drug ni  rgyal chen ris bzhi'i rigs dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral thun spyoms dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed do // /
column6: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589281#589303#TD4068E.TXT.r_2299;TD4068E.TXT.r_2300;TD4068E.TXT.r_2301;TD4068E.TXT.r_2302;TD4068E.TXT.r_2303;TD4068E.TXT.r_2304;TD4068E.TXT.r_2305# 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha drug ni  rgyal chen ris bzhi'i rigs dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral thun spyoms dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed do // /
column7: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1326013#1326014#TD4037E.TXT.r_1428;TD4037E.TXT.r_1429# rgyal rigs kyi 'khor la ji lta ba bzhin du bram ze dang  khyim bdag dang  dge sbyong gi 'khor dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams  dang ; / +sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang  de bzhin du tshangs ris dang  tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang  tshangs chen dang  'od chung dang  tshad med 'od dang  'od gsal dang  dge chung dang   tshad med dge dang  dge rgyas dang  sprin med dang  bsod nams skyes dang  'bras bu che ba dang  mi che ba dang  mi gdung ba dang  shin tu mthong dang  gya nom snang ba dang  'og min du yang de bzhin no // /
column8: 0.017#TD4049E.TXT.r#2296268#2296269#TD4049E.TXT.r_1608# sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  dud 'gro rnams dang  yi dags rnams dang  mi rnams dang   shar gyi lus 'phags dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod dang  'dzam bu gling dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang   tshangs ris dang  tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang  tshangs chen dang  'od chung dang  tshad med 'od dang  'od gsal dang  dge chung dang  tshad med dge dang  dge rgyas dang  sprin med dang  bsod nams skyes dang  'bras bu che dang  'du shes med pa'i sems can  dang ; /
column9: 0.017#TD4049E.TXT.r#2296432#2296433#TD4049E.TXT.r_1617# zla ba stong dang  nyi ma stong dang   ri'i rgyal po ri rab stong dang  shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang  'dzam bu gling stong dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod stong dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul  dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi kha rnams kyi gnas gzhan stong dang  tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi gnas gzhan stong po 'di ni stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o // /
column10: 0.017#TD4054E.TXT.r#1011559#1011560#TD4054E.TXT.r_3452# zla ba stong dang  nyi ma stong dang  ri'i  rgyal po ri rab stong dang  shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang  lho'i 'dzam bu gling stong dang  nub kyi ba gang spyod stong dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang    byed kyi lha rnams kyi gnas gzhan stong dang  tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi gnas gzhan stong po 'di ni / /
column11: 0.019#TD4035E.TXT.r#136392#136393#TD4035E.TXT.r_2012# rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams so // /
column12: 0.019#TD4098E.TXT.r#1393499#1393502#TD4098E.TXT.r_564;TD4098E.TXT.r_565# 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha drug ste / / +rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan  dang ; /
column13: 0.020#TD4067E.TXT.r#1094128#1094131#TD4067E.TXT.r_1290# 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa'i lha drug la rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral rnams dang  dga' ldan rnams dang  'phrul dga' rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams te / /
column14: 0.024#TD4049E.TXT.r#2296358#2296359#TD4049E.TXT.r_1614# sa'i dkyil 'khor la ni ri rab dang gser gyi ri bdun dang  gling bzhi dang  bar gyi gling  brgyad dang  nang gi rgya mtsho dang  phyi'i rgya mtsho dang  ri rab kyi bang rim dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang  sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas gzhan rnams dang  khor yug gi ri dang  nam mkha' la gzhal med khang rnams dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga'     // /
column15: 0.027#TD4098E.TXT.r#1393503#1393510#TD4098E.TXT.r_565;TD4098E.TXT.r_566# rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan  dang ; /
column16: 0.029#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1894086#1894086#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1275# sa bla pa'i gnod sbyin rnams las bar snang la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin rnams dang  rgyal chen ris bzhi dang  sum cu  rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis thos nas skad cig dang thang cig dang yud tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgra grags par gyur to // /

column3: lus dang dag gi las rnams yid kyis bskyed pas na bar du yid kyi las bshad do // / +da ni ngag gis phyag bya ba ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589296#589307#TD4068E.TXT.r_2302;TD4068E.TXT.r_2303;TD4068E.TXT.r_2304;TD4068E.TXT.r_2305;TD4068E.TXT.r_2306;TD4068E.TXT.r_2307# bsam gtan gnyis pa la gnas gsum ste / / +'od chung dang  tshad med 'od dang  'od gsal lo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589353#589356#TD4068E.TXT.r_2312;TD4068E.TXT.r_2313;TD4068E.TXT.r_2314;TD4068E.TXT.r_2311# de la dge rgyas kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas / / +bsam gtan gsum pa la gnas gsum ste / / +dge chung dang  tshad med dge dang  dge rgyas las / /
column6: 0.022#TD4098E.TXT.r#1393528#1393535#TD4098E.TXT.r_571;TD4098E.TXT.r_573;TD4098E.TXT.r_574;TD4098E.TXT.r_575;TD4098E.TXT.r_576;TD4098E.TXT.r_577;TD4098E.TXT.r_578# gnyis pa la gsum ste / / +tshad med 'od dang  'od gsal lo // / +gsum pa la yang gsum ste / /

column3: de dag bsngags pa mi zad ces bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +de dag ces bya ba ni ji ltar mos par bya ba dag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589308#589318#TD4068E.TXT.r_2305;TD4068E.TXT.r_2306;TD4068E.TXT.r_2307;TD4068E.TXT.r_2308# dge chung dang  tshad med dge dang  dge rgyas so // / +bsam gtan bzhi pa la gnas brgyad de / / +sprin med dang  bsod nams     // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392637#2392638#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9693# bstan bcos rnal 'byor  spyod pa'i sa las kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni gzugs med pa'i khams nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched na ni rgyu mtshan med pa'i dmigs pa rnam par rig pas tshad med pa zhes bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // /

column6: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2128149#2128150#TD4029E.TXT.r_1052# zad par gyi skye mched ni zad par sa dang  chu dang  me dang  rlung dang  sngon po dang  ser po dang  dmar po dang  dkar po dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag go // /

column11: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#24155#24158#TD4036E.TXT.r_3649# gang zag lus kyis mngon du byed pa rnam par thar pa brgyad po gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba dang  nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs    rnams la lta ba dang  sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang  'du  shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa dag lus kyi mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas shing / /
column12: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#24787#24790#TD4036E.TXT.r_3774# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched  dang ; /
column13: 0.0#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2702190#2702190#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_126# gzugs med pa'i khams na nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched na ni rgyu tshad med pa'i dmigs pa can no // /

column26: 0.0#TD4086E.TXT.r#1282112#1282113#TD4086E.TXT.r_337;TD4086E.TXT.r_338# tshangs ris  kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams  dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no // / +nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye    skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la ni kha dog med do // /

column3: de ltar yon tan lnga la sogs pa dang ldan par rig par bya'o // / +da ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bla na yod pa dang bla na med pa'i mchod pa rnam pa gnyis las bla na yod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis  te ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589379#589402#TD4068E.TXT.r_2316;TD4068E.TXT.r_2317;TD4068E.TXT.r_2318;TD4068E.TXT.r_2319;TD4068E.TXT.r_2320;TD4068E.TXT.r_2321# gong ma'i ma yin pa zhes bya ba la bsam gtan gsum pa'i gong ma ni bsam gtan bzhi pa dang gzugs med pa'i khams te / / +don du na bsam gtan bzhi pa dang  gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'dod chags  da dung ma spangs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column7: 0.016#TD4066E.TXT.r#2112674#2112676#TD4066E.TXT.r_1489;TD4066E.TXT.r_1490# snyoms  bar 'jug pa la de'i lam du 'du shes pa rnams 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go // /

column3: me tog dam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +me tog la sogs pa dam pa gang yin pa de dag ni me tog dam pa dang  phreng ba dam pa dang  sil snyan dam pa dang  ba dan dang  tsan dan dang  gur gum la sogs pa'i byug pa dam pa dang  gdugs dam pa dang  mar me  dam pa dang  bdug pa dam pa dang  na bza' dam pa dang  spos sna tshogs sbyar ba'i dri dam pa dang  tsan dan dang  gur gum dang  ga pur dang  aa ga ru la sogs pa'i phyi ma'i phur ma ri rab dang mnyam pa rnams kyis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589403#589425#TD4068E.TXT.r_2320;TD4068E.TXT.r_2321;TD4068E.TXT.r_2322;TD4068E.TXT.r_2323;TD4068E.TXT.r_2324;TD4068E.TXT.r_2325# de'i phyir 'byung ba'i 'du shes sngon du 'gro ba'i yid la byed pas zhes bya ba smos te / / +gang zag so so'i skye bo 'du shes med pa'i  ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par 'dod pa des dang po snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe na 'du shes sun 'byin te / /

column7: 0.014#TD4039E.TXT.r#1875086#1875087#TD4039E.TXT.r_6998;TD4039E.TXT.r_6999# ba dang nub pa dang ro myang ba'i nyes dmigs dang nges par 'byung ba'i 'du shes 'dris par bya ba'o // / +de la chos mthun par spyod pas bsdus pa'i bde 'gror 'gro ba'i dge ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las ni mthun pa zhes bya'o // /

column9: 0.019#TD4039E.TXT.r#1881807#1881808#TD4039E.TXT.r_7858;TD4039E.TXT.r_7859# 'dod pa'i rtog pa LA SOGS PA RTOG PA ngan pa rnams dang  'dod pa'i 'du shes la sogs pa 'du shes ngan pa rnams dang   ma rig pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i rtog pa kun nas slong ba rnams kyis nye ba'i nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa na dbugs rngub pa dang  'byung ba dran pa de nyid bsgom pa'i ni rtog pa dang  dpyod pa de dag kyang nye bar zhi bar 'gyur la ma rig pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i 'du shes rnams kyi gnyen pos / /
column10: 0.019#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#827908#827908#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_10187;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_10188# snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la sbyor ba ni de dag la snyoms par 'jug par sbyor ba'o // / +de la 'du shes dang mi mthun pas 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyor te / /
column11: 0.023#TD4039E.TXT.r#1872282#1872283#TD4039E.TXT.r_6673;TD4039E.TXT.r_6674# bsam  gtan dang po nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du ni bsten par bya ba gong na yod pa'i gnas pa'i bde ba'o // / +'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni bsten par bya ba gong na med pa'i gnas pa'i bde ba'o // /

column15: 0.025#TD4039E.TXT.r#1881323#1881324#TD4039E.TXT.r_7785;TD4039E.TXT.r_7786# rus pa dang keng  rus kyi 'du shes ni reg pa'i 'dod chags kyi gnyen po'o // / +rnam par shes pas stong pa'i khog pa so sor brtag pa'i 'du shes ni bsnyen bkur gyi 'dod chags kyi gnyen po'o // /
column16: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#155041#155047#TD4035E.TXT.r_5235;TD4035E.TXT.r_5237;TD4035E.TXT.r_5238;TD4035E.TXT.r_5236;TD4035E.TXT.r_5239# chags pa dang zhe sdang dang  gti mug gzhir gyur pa yang MA YIN PA GANG YIN PA'O // / +so sor thar pa'i sdom pas  bsdus pa'am / / +bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang  spong ba'i sdom pas bsdus pa'am / /
column17: 0.025#TD4064E.TXT.r#419298#419298#TD4064E.TXT.r_385# phyir mi  'ang ba ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa yang lam gyi stobs kyis 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob pas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dus na yang lam bzhin du 'gag par 'gyur ro // /
column18: 0.025#TD4019E.TXT.r#2467586#2467586#TD4019E.TXT.r_7941# dang por rgyun du zhugs par rtogs pa'i tshe de nyid las ma 'phos pas de rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i dbye bar bstan pa'o // /

column28: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2735924#2735924#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_5112# 'byung bar mi 'gyur RO ZHES BYA BA NAS rgyas par 'du shes yod pa'ang ma yin 'du shes med pa'ang ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du gyo ba dang rlom pa dang spros pa dang mngon par 'du byas pa'i sred pa'i rnam pa dag dang ldan par gyur pa'i sems khengs pa gang yin  pa'o ; / /
column29: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1127958#1127958#TD4047E.TXT.r_956;TD4047E.TXT.r_957# longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa'i lam ni sbyin pa'o // / +de la ma rig pas rmongs par gyur na  kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa med pas tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur ro // /
column30: 0.027#TD4066E.TXT.r#2112976#2112976#TD4066E.TXT.r_1523# 'du shes dang tshor bas yongs  su skyo nas de med pa'i phyir 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la zhi bar gnas pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur ro // /
column31: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#1354505#1354505#TD4037E.TXT.r_5146# dkon pa'i don gyis rin po che'i 'du shes dang  lhan cig skyes pa'i shes rab rgya chen po  'thob pa'i rgyu'i rang bzhin gyi don gyis mig gi 'du shes dang  lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi mi thob nas kyang shes bya yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i don gyis snang ba'i 'du shes dang  mya ngan las 'das pa dang  rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla na med pa'i go 'phang  thob pa'i rgyu'i dngos po'i don gyis 'bras bu dang  phan yon che ba'i 'du shes dang  tshe 'di la mya ngan las 'das pa dang  rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi chos ma thob pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong gi dga' ba chen po kha na ma tho ba med pa'i rgyu'i dngos po'i  don gyis dga' ba kha na ma tho ba med pa'i 'du shes so // /
column32: 0.028#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2708366#2708366#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_840# ming gi tshogs dang  tshig  gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs de dag kyang rig pa'i gnas lnga po nang gi rig pa dang  gtan tshigs kyi rig pa dang  sgra'i rig pa dang  gso ba'i rig pa dang  'jig rten pa'i bzo dang las kyi gnas kyi rig pa dag las brtsams te yongs su brtags pa yin par  rig par bya'o // /
column33: 0.028#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#826182#826182#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9916# 'du shes dang tshor ba kun du 'byung bas yongs su skyo ba ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la de med pas  zhi bar gnas pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur la / /

column36: 0.028#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2026695#2026695#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_7033# gnyid ni sems mngon par sdud pa'o zhes brjod na ni snyoms par 'jug pa la yang thal bar 'gyur bas  de'i phyir lus yang dag par 'dzin par mi nus pa'o zhes bya ba smos so // /

column5: 0.015#TD4054E.TXT.r#996675#996675#TD4054E.TXT.r_844# srid pa'i rtse mo la gyen du bskyod pa'i zhi bar gnas pa'i 'du shes sngon du btang bas yid la byed pas sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos brten pa ma yin pa rnams dang  brtan pa de dag las kyang kha cig 'gog pa la 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug ces gdags  so ; / /
column6: 0.015#TD4036E.TXT.r#56399#56401#TD4036E.TXT.r_8410# yang ba'i 'du shes dang  'jam pa'i 'du shes dang  nam mkha'i  khams kyi 'du shes dang  sems dang lus phrad pa'i 'du shes dang  mos pa'i 'du shes dang  snon spyad pa nyams su mongs ba'i go rims rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes dang  rnam pa sna tshogs 'das pa'i sgra skad kyi 'du shes dang  snang ba'i gzugs kyi mtshan ma'i 'du shes dang   nyon mongs pas byas pa'i gzugs rnam par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang  rnam par thar pa'i 'du shes dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched kyi 'du shes dang  zad par gyi skye mched kyi 'du shes so // /
column7: 0.016#TD4039E.TXT.r#1881269#1881270#TD4039E.TXT.r_7778;TD4039E.TXT.r_7779# rnyed pa'i bsam pa dang  'dod pa'i sred pa'i gnyen por ni 'dod pa rnams la nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes so // / +'tsho ba'i bsam pa dang  srid pa'i sred pa'i gnyen por ni 'chi ba'i 'du shes so // /
column8: 0.018#TD4036E.TXT.r#34159#34159#TD4036E.TXT.r_5230# bral ba'i dbyings dang  'gog pa'i dbyings la zhi bar lta ba ni spang pa'i 'du shes dang  'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang  'gog pa'i 'du shes sgom par byed do // /
column9: 0.018#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2712921#2712923#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_1403# mtshan ma  dang bcas pa'i 'du shes dang  mtshan ma med pa'i 'du shes dang  chung ngu'i 'du shes dang  chen por gyur pa'i 'du shes dang  tshad med pa'i 'du shes dang  ci yang med pa'i 'du shes so // /
column10: 0.020#TD4036E.TXT.r#47822#47822#TD4036E.TXT.r_7296;TD4036E.TXT.r_7297# de ni sems kun du gdung bar 'gyur ba'i yid la byed pa yin no // / +de la sems mngon par brlan par 'gyur ba'i yid la byed pa gang zhe na / /
column11: 0.022#TD4039E.TXT.r#1875086#1875087#TD4039E.TXT.r_6998;TD4039E.TXT.r_6999# ba dang nub pa dang ro myang ba'i nyes dmigs dang nges par 'byung ba'i 'du shes 'dris par bya ba'o // / +de la chos mthun par spyod pas bsdus pa'i bde 'gror 'gro ba'i dge ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las ni mthun pa zhes bya'o // /
column12: 0.026#TD4054E.TXT.r#996471#996471#TD4054E.TXT.r_818;TD4054E.TXT.r_819# byams pa la sogs pa'i gnyen pos bar du gcod par byed par rig par bya'o // / +sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams gang thob pa dang  'du shes med pa'i snyoms 'jug dang  'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug dang   'du shes med pa can dang  srog gi dbang po dang  ris mthun pa dang  skye ba dang  rga ba dang  gnas pa dang  mi rtag pa nyid dang  ming gi tshogs rnams dang  tshig gi tshogs rnams dang  gsal byed kyi tshogs rnams dang  so so'i skye bo nyid dang  'jug pa dang  so sor    nges pa dang  sbyor ba dang  mgyogs pa dang  go rims dang  dus dang  yul dang  grangs dang  tshogs pa'o // /
column13: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2712932#2712933#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_1404;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_1405;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_1406# de yang mdor bsdu na 'jig rten pa'i dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i'o // / +de    la chung ngu'i 'du shes ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i'o // / +chen por gyur pa'i 'du shes ni gzugs na spyod pa'i'o // /
column14: 0.027#TD4039E.TXT.r#1876562#1876562#TD4039E.TXT.r_7165;TD4039E.TXT.r_7166# grogs ni tshul bzhin pa yin pa yid la byed pa dang  mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyin ci log gi 'du shes so // / +gong ma'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sbyor ba las byung ba'i sems ni chen por gyur ba zhes bya'o // /
column15: 0.027#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1450102#1450102#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_5904;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_5905# 'du shes dang tshor ba kun du 'byung bas yongs su skyo ba rnams ni de la zhi bar gnas pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur te / / +yid la byed pa de lta bus 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di la snyoms par 'jug go // /
column16: 0.028#TD4054E.TXT.r#996636#996636#TD4054E.TXT.r_836;TD4054E.TXT.r_837# 'du shes sngon du btang zhes pa ni thar pa'i 'du shes sngon du btang ba'o // / +brtan pa ma yin pa rnams shes pa ni 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pas bsdus pa rnams so // /
column17: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#47786#47786#TD4036E.TXT.r_7292# sems kun du gdung bar 'gyur ba'i yin la byed pa dang  sems mngon par brlan par 'gyur ba'i yid la byed pa dang  shin tu sbyang pa skyed pa'i yid la byed pa dang  ye shes dang mthong ba rnams par sbyong ba'i yid la byed pas so // /
column18: 0.028#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1612087#1612087#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_3030# zhi bar gnas pa'i 'du shes sngon du btang ba'i yid la byed pas 'di la snyoms par 'jug gi / /
column19: 0.029#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2723663#2723663#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3038# de'i  phyir mos pa'i nyes pas skyon chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan par rig par bya'o // /
column20: 0.029#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2749352#2749353#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_6802# RNA BA LA SOGS PA LHAG ma rnams kyang de dang 'dra ba dang  reg pa 'gags pas kyang tshor ba skyes pa'i gnas kyi bya ba byed par mi nus pa dang  de dang 'byung ba'i yid la byed pa  'gags pas kyang de dang 'byung ba'i rnam par shes pa skyes pa'i gnas kyi bya ba byed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: bla na     // / +med pa'i mchod pa rgya che ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyi mthu las skyes pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du khyab par chos kyi dbyings dam pas rgyal ba de dag kun la bdag gi bsam bas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#933402#933404#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5585# de'i don ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa las gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i bag chags dang  sa bon yod pa nas mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa drug 'byung ba la ni nang gi skye mched drug du bshad / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#955398#955400#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8379# 'dzin par snang ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa drug du snang ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2918822#2918825#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7154# gnas kyi dngos por skye ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa drug ni gnas  pa zhes bya'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2920005#2920008#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7290;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7291# de la gnas pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa nas / / +yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa drug go // /
column8: 0.0#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2940125#2940126#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9902# longs spyod ni mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du / /
column9: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589474#589488#TD4068E.TXT.r_2332;TD4068E.TXT.r_2333;TD4068E.TXT.r_2334;TD4068E.TXT.r_2335# 'byung ba'i 'du shes sngon du 'gro ba'i yid la byed pa zhes bya'o // / +de la sems dang sems las byung    ba la rnam pa gnyis te / /
column10: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589485#589497#TD4068E.TXT.r_2335;TD4068E.TXT.r_2336;TD4068E.TXT.r_2337# de la mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa drug ni mi brtan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba zhes bya ste / /
column11: 1.788#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2947098#2947103#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_10969;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_10970# ces bshad pa'i tshul du shes na nyon mongs pa'i yid kyi rang bzhin shes pa yin no // / +rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa drug la bya ste / /
column12: 1.788#TD4068E.TXT.r#593854#593859#TD4068E.TXT.r_2827;TD4068E.TXT.r_2828;TD4068E.TXT.r_2829# dmigs pa rnam par rig pa'i shes pa de la yang rnam pa drug yod de /// / +mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du / /
column13: 0.008#TD4068E.TXT.r#607977#607979#TD4068E.TXT.r_4263# yid kyi khams kyi bar du dbang  po drug gi khams dang  gzugs kyi khams nas reg bya'i khams kyi bar du yul drug gi khams dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa'i khams drug ste / /
column14: 0.011#TD4068E.TXT.r#589733#589735#TD4068E.TXT.r_2357;TD4068E.TXT.r_2358# de las sems gzhan 'byung ba dang mi mthun pa'i  lus des mig gi rnam par shes pa nas / / +yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug sems las byung ba'i 'khor dang bcas par 'byung ba'i bgegs byas nas ril gyis mi 'byung bas bkag pas na / /
column15: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#950657#950657#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7747# yul drug la dmigs par byed pa'i sems mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du med par khong du chud pa ni dmigs  pa mi dmigs pa rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya'o // /
column16: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2874827#2874827#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_991# de la mig gi rnam par shes pa nas lus kyi  rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs kyis srog gcod pa la sogs pa mi dge ba spong zhing dge ba la 'jug par byed de / /
column17: 0.020#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2897270#2897270#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4106# de la mig gi rnam par shes pa nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs kyis mi bde ba myong bar ni sdug bsngal ba zhes bya'o // /
column18: 0.020#TD4068E.TXT.r#586990#586991#TD4068E.TXT.r_2051# gnas ngan len gyi gyeng ba dang  yid la byed pa'i gyeng ba dang  de la mig gi rnam par shes pa nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs la ni rang bzhin gyis gyeng ba zhes bya ste / /
column19: 0.021#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1427669#1427670#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_3158# de dag    kho nas rnam par shes pa bstan zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pas mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du bstan gyi / /
column20: 0.026#TD4068E.TXT.r#601557#601564#TD4068E.TXT.r_3589;TD4068E.TXT.r_3590# gang yang mig gi rnam par shes pa nas / / +yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du drug po 'gags ma thag pa la yid ces bya ba yang mig nas lus kyi bar du rnam par shes pa lnga'i rten ni mig gi dbang po nas lus kyi dbang po'i bar du lnga yin par  grags na / /
column21: 0.027#TD4051E.TXT.r#1235869#1235870#TD4051E.TXT.r_524;TD4051E.TXT.r_525# lta ba la sogs pa drug ni mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa nas / / +yid la sogs pa'i bar du ci rigs su sbyar ro // /
column22: 0.027#TD4068E.TXT.r#571582#571583#TD4068E.TXT.r_88# gzugs kyi phung po ni thogs pa dang bcas pa dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa lnga'i rten du gyur pa dang  mig nas  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa drug gi dmigs par gyur pa'i phyir thams cad pas rags shing sbom pas na dang por gzugs kyi phung po bshad do // /
column23: 0.027#TD4066E.TXT.r#2114258#2114262#TD4066E.TXT.r_1711;TD4066E.TXT.r_1712# de ni 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa drug ste mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du'o // /
column24: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#928798#928798#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4920# de la gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed de phung po bzhi dang  rnam par shes pa'i phung po las  mig gi rnam par shes pa nas nyon mongs pa'i yid kyi bar du dag NA CHOS KYI DBYINGS RNAM PAR dag par 'gyur ro // /

column3: bzang po spyod la dad pa'i stobs dag  gis // / +zhes bya ba ni bzang po spyod pa la mos pa dang  dad cing nges par yid ches pa de'i stobs kyis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589495#589509#TD4068E.TXT.r_2335;TD4068E.TXT.r_2336;TD4068E.TXT.r_2337# de la mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa drug ni mi brtan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba zhes bya ste / / +de ci'i phyir zhe na / / +rnam par shes pa snyoms par 'jug pa dang   'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang  sems med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang  sems med pa'i brgyal ba dang  gnyid stug pos non pa la sogs pa sems med pa'i dus de dag na yang rgyun chad de med pa dang  sems dang bcas pa'i dus na yang nam dge ba la dmigs pa'i tshe na mi dge ba'i sems dang lung du ma bstan  pa'i sems mi gnas te med / /
column5: 0.024#TD4079E.TXT.r#759165#759167#TD4079E.TXT.r_437# yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang skad cig re re zhing kun gzhi las byung nas  'jug par 'gyur la sems med pa'i gnyid dang  brgyal ba dang  'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang  'du shes med pa dang  'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag las mi skye'o // /
column6: 0.026#TD4068E.TXT.r#601504#601504#TD4068E.TXT.r_3585# lung du ma bstan par byed pa'i dus dang  'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang  'du shes med pa pa dang  sems med pa'i gnyid dang  brgyal ba la sogs pa'i tshe dus thams cad du kun gzhi la bdag tu lta zhing dmigs pa rgyun mchad par byed pas na  rtag tu zhes bya'o // /
column7: 0.026#TD4068E.TXT.r#602064#602064#TD4068E.TXT.r_3642# de gsum gyi dus  las ma gtogs par dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i dus dang  'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang  'du shes med pa pa dang  sems med pa'i gnyid dang  brgyal ba la sogs pa'i dus na rtag tu yod do zhes bstan pa yin no // /
column8: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#828348#828348#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_10257;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_10258# yang na sems kyis  'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de la snyoms par 'jug pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa yin te / / +snyoms par 'jug pa dang sems gnyis lhan cig gnas par 'gal ba'i phyir ji ltar snyoms par 'jug ce na / /

column3: bzang po spyod pa ni mdo sde du ma nas byang chub sems dpa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589508#589517#TD4068E.TXT.r_2337# rnam par shes pa snyoms par 'jug pa dang   'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang  sems med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang  sems med pa'i brgyal ba dang  gnyid stug pos non pa la sogs pa sems med pa'i dus de dag na yang rgyun chad de med pa dang  sems dang bcas pa'i dus na yang nam dge ba la dmigs pa'i tshe na mi dge ba'i sems dang lung du ma bstan  pa'i sems mi gnas te med / /

column3: da ni ji ltar bshad pa'i phyag bya ba dang  mchod pa rnams mjug  brtul ba'i phyir / /

column5: 0.027#TD4054E.TXT.r#1010900#1010901#TD4054E.TXT.r_3362;TD4054E.TXT.r_3363# gcig tu 'jig rten pa'i dge ba rnams dang  mi dge ba dang  lung du ma bstan    pa rnams kyi ste / /

column3: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang gis zhes bya ba la  sogs pa'o // / +de la rang bzhin ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589549#589558#TD4068E.TXT.r_2339;TD4068E.TXT.r_2340# nam lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa de'i tshe na dge ba'i sems dang mi dge ba'i sems mi gnas te med pas na 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa drug ni mi  brtan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.029#TD4068E.TXT.r#590780#590782#TD4068E.TXT.r_2457;TD4068E.TXT.r_2458# rang gi lus la sems dang sems las byung ba'i sa bon yod pa mthu nyams par  byas pas na sems tha ma des bdag dang 'dra ba'i sems gzhan bskyed par mi nus te / / +rnam par shes pa drug rnams 'gags par gyur pas na mi brtan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba 'gag pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: sdig pa bdag gis bgyis pa ci mchis pa // / +zhes bya ba ste / / +tshe 'di dang tshe gzhan du byas pa dang  byed du bcug pa dang  rjes su yi rang ba rnams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589555#589568#TD4068E.TXT.r_2339;TD4068E.TXT.r_2340;TD4068E.TXT.r_2341;TD4068E.TXT.r_2342# nam lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa de'i tshe na dge ba'i sems dang mi dge ba'i sems mi gnas te med pas na 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa drug ni mi  brtan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba zhes bya'o // / +kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang nyon mongs pa'i yid gnyis ni brtan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba zhes bya ste / /

column3: lus dang dag dang yid la gnas nas so // / +de lta bu de dag thams cad rgyal ba kun dang de'i sras rnams kyi spyan sngar 'dug pa bzhin du shin tu 'gyod pa'i yid kyis skad cig re re la yang bshags shing smyur te skyug par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589577#589588#TD4068E.TXT.r_2342;TD4068E.TXT.r_2343# kun gzhi yang nam dgra bcom pa thob pa'i dus na med du zin gyi 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug  pa dang  'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang  sems med ba'i brgyal ba la sogs pa sems med pa'i dus thams cad na yang yod la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589588#589606#TD4068E.TXT.r_2342;TD4068E.TXT.r_2343;TD4068E.TXT.r_2344# kun gzhi yang nam dgra bcom pa thob pa'i dus na med du zin gyi 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug  pa dang  'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang  sems med ba'i brgyal ba la sogs pa sems med pa'i dus thams cad na yang yod la / / +dge ba dang mi dge ba la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i sems dang bcas pa'i dus na yang rtag par yod pas na brtan pa'i sems dang sems las  byung ba zhes bya la / /
column6: 0.023#TD4052E.TXT.r#2862413#2862413#TD4052E.TXT.r_2403# srid pa'i rtse mo yang 'gro ba'i rten ma yin te de'i sa pa'i sems dang sems  las byung ba med pa'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2341302#2341304#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3532;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3533# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis 'phags pa rdo rje gcod pa'i 'grel ba mdzad pa las ni / / +rgya che ba'i sems dang mchog tu gyur pa'i sems dang  rtag par byed pa'i sems dang  phyin ci ma log pa'i sems zhes bshad do // /
column8: 0.028#TD4066E.TXT.r#2105218#2105218#TD4066E.TXT.r_443# de ni 'di skad du rnam par rig byed dang ting nge 'dzin las byung ba dge ba dang mi dge  ba las byung ba rgyur byas pa'i gzugs ni sems gyeng ba dang  ma gyeng ba dang  sems med pa na yang rjes su 'brang ba gang yin pa ste / /

column3: da ni bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba  bshad de / / +phyogs bcu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589602#589609#TD4068E.TXT.r_2343;TD4068E.TXT.r_2344# dge ba dang mi dge BA LA SOGS PA LA dmigs pa'i sems dang bcas pa'i dus na yang rtag par yod pas na brtan pa'i sems dang sems las  byung ba zhes bya la / / +nyon mongs pa'i yid kyang zag pa med pa'i lam gyi bden pa'i dus dang  'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dus dang  mi slob pa'i dus rnams na med par zad kyi / /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589631#589637#TD4068E.TXT.r_2346;TD4068E.TXT.r_2347# de ltar na don gyi shugs kyis 'di 'dra bar 'gyur te / / +zag pa med pa'i lam gyi dus na nyon mongs pa'i yid med ces bshad na zag pa can 'jig rten pa rnams kyi lam gyi dus na nyon mongs pa'i yid yod do zhes bstan pa yin no // /
column6: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#528276#528276#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10290# mngal  na gnas pa'i dus dang  btsas pa'i dus dang  byis pa'i dus dang  gzhon nu'i dus dang  lang tsho'i dus dang  dar la bab pa'i dus dang  rgas pa'i dus dang  'khogs pa'i dus so // /
column7: 0.016#TD4032E.TXT.r#1960345#1960346#TD4032E.TXT.r_6332;TD4032E.TXT.r_6333;TD4032E.TXT.r_6334# de la so so'i skye bo'i dus ni sngon gyi mtha'o // / +mi slob pa'i  dus ni phyi ma'i mtha'o // /
column8: 0.017#TD4035E.TXT.r#143055#143062#TD4035E.TXT.r_3141# nges pa'i dus dang  ldog pa'i dus dang  las kyi dus dang  'jig rten pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dus dang  'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i  dus dang  sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i dus so // /

column11: 0.018#TD4010E.TXT.r#2269710#2269711#TD4010E.TXT.r_5068;TD4010E.TXT.r_5069;TD4010E.TXT.r_5070# de la mngon par rtogs pa'i dus kyang gsum du 'gyur te / / +dgra bcom pa'i dus    dang ; / +phyir mi 'ong ba'i dus dang  rgyun du zhugs pa'i dus so // /
column12: 0.021#TD4009E.TXT.r#337496#337496#TD4009E.TXT.r_2318# rnam par ma dag pa'i dus dang  rnam par dag pa'i dus dang  rab tu rtogs pa'i dus dang  yongs su mthar phyin pa'i dus so // /
column13: 0.022#TD4018E.TXT.r#3025875#3025877#TD4018E.TXT.r_2948# ne yi ya yi ka dang  khyad bar can rnams kyis skad cig pa drug tu gnas par kun tu rtog pa ni yod pa dang  'brel ba'i dus dang gnas pa'i dus dang  tha mar yon tan skye ba'i dus dang  dmigs pa'i dus dang      // /
column14: 0.022#TD4095E.TXT.r#97875#97875#TD4095E.TXT.r_6735# mi slob pa'i lam la ni dus dang sbyor ba dang  dus dang mi sbyor bas rnam par grol ba'o // /
column15: 0.027#TD4068E.TXT.r#602027#602033#TD4068E.TXT.r_3640# 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dus na ni nyon mongs pa'i    yid yod pas zhib ma yin gyi 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dus na nyon mongs pa'i yid med pas tshes zhi ba zhes bya ste / /

column3: phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams dang  dus gsum du gang slob pa'i gang zag bdun dang  gang mi slob pa'i dgra bcom pa dang  gang rang  rgyal ba'i rnam pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589610#589621#TD4068E.TXT.r_2344;TD4068E.TXT.r_2345# nyon mongs pa'i yid kyang zag pa med pa'i lam gyi bden pa'i dus dang  'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dus dang  mi slob pa'i dus rnams na med par zad kyi / /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589621#589629#TD4068E.TXT.r_2345;TD4068E.TXT.r_2346;TD4068E.TXT.r_2347# de las ma gtogs pa'i dus thams cad du yod pas na brtan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#528276#528276#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10290# mngal  na gnas pa'i dus dang  btsas pa'i dus dang  byis pa'i dus dang  gzhon nu'i dus dang  lang tsho'i dus dang  dar la bab pa'i dus dang  rgas pa'i dus dang  'khogs pa'i dus so // /
column7: 0.026#TD4032E.TXT.r#1960345#1960346#TD4032E.TXT.r_6332;TD4032E.TXT.r_6333;TD4032E.TXT.r_6334# de la so so'i skye bo'i dus ni sngon gyi mtha'o // / +mi slob pa'i  dus ni phyi ma'i mtha'o // /
